select.if: SELECT T.GROUP_ID_0 AS GROUPID, NVL(T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME, '云南省') GROUPNAME, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) AS DEV_2G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) AS SR_2G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) AS DEV_3G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) AS SR_3G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS DEV_4G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS SR_4G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_DEV_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_SR_NUM FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_INCOME_DEV_CHNL_DAY T WHERE T.DEAL_DATE = #{dealDate} GROUP BY GROUPING SETS(T.GROUP_ID_0,(T.GROUP_ID_0, T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME)) ORDER BY TOTAL_SR_NUM DESC

SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME, NVL(T.UNIT_NAME, T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME) AS GROUPNAME, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) AS DEV_2G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) AS SR_2G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) AS DEV_3G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) AS SR_3G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS DEV_4G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS SR_4G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_DEV_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_SR_NUM FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_INCOME_DEV_CHNL_DAY T WHERE T.DEAL_DATE = #{dealDate} AND T.GROUP_ID_1 = #{orgCode} GROUP BY GROUPING SETS(T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,(T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME, T.UNIT_NAME)) ORDER BY TOTAL_SR_NUM DESC

SELECT T.UNIT_NAME, NVL(T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME, T.UNIT_NAME) AS GROUPNAME, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) AS DEV_2G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) AS SR_2G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) AS DEV_3G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) AS SR_3G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS DEV_4G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS SR_4G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_DEV_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_SR_NUM FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_INCOME_DEV_CHNL_DAY T WHERE T.DEAL_DATE = #{dealDate} AND T.UNIT_ID = #{orgCode} GROUP BY GROUPING SETS(T.UNIT_NAME,(T.UNIT_NAME, T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME)) ORDER BY TOTAL_SR_NUM DESC

SELECT T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) AS DEV_2G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) AS SR_2G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) AS DEV_3G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) AS SR_3G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS DEV_4G_NUM, SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS SR_4G_NUM, SUM(T.DEV_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.DEV_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_DEV_NUM, SUM(T.SR_2G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_3G_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_WIFI_NUM) + SUM(T.SR_4G_NUM) AS TOTAL_SR_NUM FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_INCOME_DEV_CHNL_DAY T WHERE T.DEAL_DATE = #{dealDate} AND T.GROUP_ID_4 = #{orgCode} GROUP BY T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME ORDER BY TOTAL_SR_NUM DESC

mapper.select: SELECT '1' as FLAG, BILLINGCYCLID, GROUP_ID_0_NAME GROUPNAME, GROUP_ID_0_NAME || '--' || GROUP_ID_0 AS ORGANIZATIONAL, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_2G),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_2G, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_3G),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_3G, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_NETWORK),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_NETWORK, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_FLOW),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_FLOW, TO_CHAR(SUM(CHANL_SUBSIDY),'99999999990.00') CHANL_SUBSIDY, TO_CHAR(SUM(OTHER),'99999999990.00') OTHER, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL),'99999999990.00') TOTAL FROM PMRT.TB_MRT_COMM_AGENT_REPORT WHERE BILLINGCYCLID = #{dealDate} AND GROUP_ID_0 = #{code} GROUP BY GROUP_ID_0_NAME,GROUP_ID_0_NAME || '--' || GROUP_ID_0,BILLINGCYCLID UNION ALL SELECT '2' as FLAG, BILLINGCYCLID, GROUP_ID_1_NAME GROUPNAME, GROUP_ID_1_NAME || '--' || GROUP_ID_1 AS ORGANIZATIONAL, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_2G),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_2G, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_3G),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_3G, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_NETWORK),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_NETWORK, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL_FLOW),'99999999990.00') TOTAL_FLOW, TO_CHAR(SUM(CHANL_SUBSIDY),'99999999990.00') CHANL_SUBSIDY, TO_CHAR(SUM(OTHER),'99999999990.00') OTHER, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAL),'99999999990.00') TOTAL FROM PMRT.TB_MRT_COMM_AGENT_REPORT WHERE BILLINGCYCLID = #{dealDate} AND GROUP_ID_0 = #{code} GROUP BY GROUP_ID_1_NAME,GROUP_ID_1_NAME || '--' || GROUP_ID_1,BILLINGCYCLID

select * from ( SELECT max(max_date) as max_date, max(group_id_0_name) as groupname, sum(nvl(T2.DEV_G2,0)) as dev_g2, sum(nvl(t2.DEV_G3,0)) as dev_g3, sum(nvl(t2.DEV_WIFI,0)) as dev_wifi, sum(nvl((T2.DEV_G2+t2.DEV_G3+t2.DEV_WIFI),0)) AS DEV_ALL FROM ( select '全省' group_id_0_name,c.* from PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE c ) T1
JOIN ( select max(BB.DEAL_DATE) as max_date, BB.HQ_CHAN_CODE AS CH_CODE, SUM(case bb.net_type when '0' then bb.dev_num ELSE 0 end) DEV_G2, SUM(case bb.net_type when '1' then bb.dev_num ELSE 0 end) DEV_G3, SUM(case bb.net_type when '2' then bb.dev_num ELSE 0 end) DEV_WIFI from PMRT.TB_MRT_JF_DEV_INCOME_hour bb WHERE BB.DEAL_DATE = to_char(${realTime},'yyyymmddhh24') and group_id_0 =#{code} GROUP BY BB.HQ_CHAN_CODE )T2 ON T1.HQ_CHAN_CODE=T2.CH_CODE group by group_id_0 union SELECT max(max_date) as max_date, max(group_id_1_name) as groupname, sum(nvl(T2.DEV_G2,0)) as dev_g2, sum(nvl(t2.DEV_G3,0)) as dev_g3, sum(nvl(t2.DEV_WIFI,0)) as dev_wifi, sum(nvl((T2.DEV_G2+t2.DEV_G3+t2.DEV_WIFI),0)) AS DEV_ALL FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T1 JOIN ( select max(BB.DEAL_DATE) as max_date, BB.HQ_CHAN_CODE AS CH_CODE, SUM(case bb.net_type when '0' then bb.dev_num ELSE 0 end) DEV_G2, SUM(case bb.net_type when '1' then bb.dev_num ELSE 0 end) DEV_G3, SUM(case bb.net_type when '2' then bb.dev_num ELSE 0 end) DEV_WIFI from PMRT.TB_MRT_JF_DEV_INCOME_hour bb WHERE BB.DEAL_DATE = to_char(${realTime},'yyyymmddhh24') and group_id_0 =#{code} GROUP BY BB.HQ_CHAN_CODE )T2 ON T1.HQ_CHAN_CODE=T2.CH_CODE group by group_id_1 ) order by dev_g2 desc

SELECT HQ.LOG_NO, HQ.LAT_NO, HQ.IMGFORNT, HQ.IMGMIDDLE, HQ.IMGLATER, HQ.GROUP_ID_4, HQ.GROUP_ID_4_NAME, CHNL_ADDR, HQ_CHAN_CODE FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE HQ WHERE HQ.LOG_NO=#{log} AND HQ.LAT_NO=#{lat}
SELECT T.LONGITUDE LOG_NO, T.LATITUDE LAT_NO, T.STATION_NAME, T.STATION_TYPE, T.STATION_SERIAL FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_STATION_NE_ADDR_CODE T WHERE T.LONGITUDE=#{log} AND T.LATITUDE=#{lat}

AND HA.GROUP_ID_1=#{group}

SELECT AVG(T.LONGITUDE) LOG_NO, AVG(T.LATITUDE) LAT_NO, COUNT(*) NUM, T.UNIT_ID FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_STATION_NE_ADDR_CODE T WHERE T.LONGITUDE IS NOT NULL AND T.LATITUDE IS NOT NULL AND T.STATION_TYPE_CODE ${status}

SELECT AVG(T.LONGITUDE) LOG_NO, AVG(T.LATITUDE) LAT_NO, COUNT(*) NUM, T.GROUP_ID_1 FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_STATION_NE_ADDR_CODE T WHERE T.LONGITUDE IS NOT NULL AND T.LATITUDE IS NOT NULL AND T.STATION_TYPE_CODE ${status}
